item.title: Networking Basics: Understanding OSI Layers and TCP IP Model
item.category: "Networking Basics" , "OSI Layers" , "TCP IP Model" , "Network Protocols" , "Communication Models" , "Networking Fundamentals" , "Data Transmission" , "Network Troubleshooting" , "Network Architecture" , "Networking Concepts"
item.description: Gain a comprehensive understanding of the OSI layers and TCP IP model, essential frameworks in networking, to facilitate effective communication and troubleshooting.
